custom.text: Install our recommended development environment and begin working on your project. Some setup required.

sass.text: Sass version for advanced theming of Evolution. Compiled HTML and Javascript. Requires knowledge of Sass.

css.text: CSS version is the most basic setup. Compiled HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Required knowledge of CSS and JS.

data.text: The Top Bar gives you a great way to display a complex navigation bar.
Grids and Block Grids are the basis for the grid system used in Evolution.
Thin Footer appears consistently at the bottom of every page.
The Mercer color palette is designed to support a range of visual styles.
Evolution's icons use an icon Web font based primarily on the IcoMoon ultimate set.
Proxima Nova has been implemented as the default font family for Evolution.
